1101011110001010 1111000111100011 1 -> sum: 1100100101101110, cout: 1

0011111010101100 0001011011001111 1 -> sum: 0101010101111100, cout: 0

0100011100110011 0110011000101101 1 -> sum: 1010110101100001, cout: 0
0111101111001000 0110101101010110 0 -> sum: 1110011100011110, cout: 0
